article.title: LRAD to Provide Integrated Acoustic Hailing Devices to U.S. Navy
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: LRAD Corp., San Diego, California, is being awarded a $6 million contract for integrated acoustic hailing devices, remotely controlled components of the shipboard protection system that provides a key capability to instruct, warn and deter approaching threats.Â Naval Surface Warfare Center, Crane, Indiana, is the contracting activity.
